name: Avocado Shake
description: Best rich, creamy, and simply delicious milkshake
directions: First, set out a high speed blender. Slice and scoop the avocado flesh (from 1 medium to large avocado) into the blender base. Add 1 cup almond milk.
Add 3 to 4 tablespoons maple syrup or raw sugar (depending on desired sweetness), 1 teaspoon dried moringa or ½ teaspoon ground moringa (optional) and ½ teaspoon vanilla extract .
Blend on medium speed for a minute or two, until completely blended. If you prefer a flowing thin consistency, add more almond milk.
